=== Add Headers ===
Contributors: gnotaras
Tags: cache, http, headers, web, server, response, optimize, expires, cache-control, last-modified, etag
Requires at least: 3.1.0
Tested up to: 3.7.1
Stable tag: 1.0.1
License: GPLv3
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt

Adds cache related headers to HTTP responses generated by WordPress.


== Description ==

*Add-Headers* adds cache related headers to HTTP responses generated by WordPress.


== Installation ==

Add-Headers can be easily installed through the plugin management interface from within the WordPress administration panel (*recommended*).


== Upgrade Notice ==

No special requirements when upgrading.


== Frequently Asked Questions ==

No FAQ available at this time.


== Screenshots ==

No screenshots are available at this time.

Please check out the changelog of each release by following the links below. You can also check the [roadmap](http://www.codetrax.org/projects/wp-add-headers/roadmap "Add-Headers Roadmap") regarding future releases of the plugin.

- [1.0.1](http://www.codetrax.org/versions/000)
 - Add here
